overview_of_class: Every year teams of McCormick undergraduates from different departments come together to build robots and compete for prizes. Teams of students design, build, and program their robots independently before setting their creations loose on a pre-determined track during the spring competition.
name: Design Competition
title: MEAS DSGN 360-0-20 Design Competition
